Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.26251517]Hepatitis C Virus(HCV):inhibition of viral infection in Huh7.5.1 cells(EC50=0.52 ± 0.07 μM); inhibition of post-infection in Huh7.5.1 cells(EC50=1.54 ± 0.73 μM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.26251517]<10% hemolysis even at 400 μM against human erythrocytes.
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: [Ref.26251517]Huh7.5.1 cells:CC50=47.22 ± 5.29 μM;Bel7402 cells:CC50~200 μM;HeLa cells:CC50~200 μM.
Sequence Information.Comments: No comments found on DRAMP database

Literature.Title: A p7 Ion Channel-derived Peptide Inhibits Hepatitis C Virus Infection in Vitro.
Literature.Author: Hong W, Lang Y, Li T, Zeng Z, Song Y, Wu Y, Li W, Cao Z.
